mapper.sql: t_workapproval.id, t_workapproval.id_type, t_workapproval.id_teacher, t_workapproval.workTitle, t_workapproval.begin_date, t_workapproval.end_date, t_workapproval.location, t_workapproval.member, t_workapproval.appovalFlag, t_workapproval.sumbitDate, t_workapproval.appovalDate, t_workapproval.id_subAdmin, t_workapprovaltype.typeName, t_teacher.userName
t_workapproval.workContent, t_workapproval.remark, t_workapproval.bak1, t_workapproval.bak2, t_workapproval.bak3, t_workapproval.bak4
mapper.select: select t_workapproval.id, t_workapproval.id_type, t_workapproval.id_teacher, t_workapproval.workTitle, t_workapproval.begin_date, t_workapproval.end_date, t_workapproval.location, t_workapproval.member, t_workapproval.appovalFlag, t_workapproval.sumbitDate, t_workapproval.appovalDate, t_workapproval.id_subAdmin, t_workapprovaltype.typeName,t_teacher.userName from t_workapproval INNER JOIN t_teacher ON t_workapproval.id_teacher = t_teacher.id INNER JOIN t_workapprovaltype on t_workapproval.id_type = t_workapprovaltype.id WHERE t_teacher.id_section = #{section_id}

select
distinct
,
from t_workapproval INNER JOIN t_workapprovaltype on t_workapproval.id_type = t_workapprovaltype.id INNER JOIN t_teacher on t_workapproval.id_teacher = t_teacher.id
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from t_workapproval
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_workapproval (id, id_type, id_teacher, workTitle, begin_date, end_date, location, member, appovalFlag, sumbitDate, appovalDate, id_subAdmin, workContent, remark, bak1, bak2, bak3, bak4 ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{idType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{idTeacher,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{worktitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{member,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appovalflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sumbitdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{appovaldate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{idSubadmin,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{workcontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{bak1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{bak2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{bak3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{bak4,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
